page.title: 07THE ASHLEY CENTRE, EPSOM
page.content: {The Ashley Centre is a large indoor {shopping precinct in the centre of {Epsom.}It was officially opened by the Queen in 1984. It has a ground floor with 48 shops, a second floor with a cafe and a managerial office. Above all this is a multi-storey car park with direct access to the shopping area. {A survey of shoppers}revealed that people thought the centre was very good and extremely convenient. Older people especially liked being able to shop in comfort. Shops in the centre range from an Army & Navy store to John Menzies, Dixons, Next, Mothercare, Marks & Spencer's and many others. There is also a theatre in the same complex.
